pages.title: Demeter's Blessing
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 2 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Very Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Harvests and replants crops. $(br)Gains durability from tilling, but loses durability from harvesting
